    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112576</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Kitchen - Phrases 1</string>
            <string language="en">The Kitchen - Phrases 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Küche - Phrasen 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Cuisine - Expressions 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cozinha - Frases 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Cucina - Frasi 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κουζίνα - φράσεις 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cocina - Frases 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you will learn some phrases that have to do with the kitchen and the items often used in a kitchen. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you will learn some phrases that have to do with the kitchen and the items often used in a kitchen. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">living</string>
            <string language="sv">kitchen</string>
            <string language="sv">housing</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">living</string>
            <string language="en">kitchen</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung erlernen Sie einige Phrasen, die 
der Küche und den Einzelteilen miteinbeziehen, die häufig in einer 
Küche benutzt werden. Enthält Ton und Text. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 4 - wie leben Sie?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous apprendrez quelques 
expressions qui doivent faire avec la cuisine et les éléments 
souvent utilisés dans une cuisine. Contient le bruit et le 
texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - 
module 4 - comment vivez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você aprenderá algumas frases 
que têm que fazer com a cozinha e os artigos usados frequentemente em
uma cozinha. Contem  o som e o texto. Safir - vida do 
inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 4 - como você vive?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione imparerete alcune frasi 
che riguardano la cucina e gli articoli usati spesso in una cucina. 
Contiene sia il suono che il testo. Safir - inglese e vita
attiva per i principianti - modulo 4 - come vivete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση θα μάθετε μερικές φράσεις που 
πρέπει να κάνουν με την κουζίνα και τα αντικείμενα που 
χρησιμοποιούνται συχνά σε μια κουζίνα. Περιέχει και τον ήχο
και το κείμενο. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή 
ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 4 - πώς ζείτε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted aprenderá algunas frases 
que tengan que hacer con la cocina y los items usados a menudo en una 
cocina. Contiene el sonido y el texto. ¿Safir - inglés y 
vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 4 - cómo usted vive?</string>
          </description>
